data.title: The Best Video Game Villains of All Time
data.meta_description: Over 16K fans have voted on the 130+ characters on Best Video Game Villains of All Time. Current Top 3: Vaas, Handsome Jack, Joker
data.text:
When it comes down to it, who is the best video game villain of all time? Gaming enthusiasts, it's time to sound off!

Video games typically a focus on the protagonist — obviously, because you're often playing that character — but many games have become classics due to the strength of the badass villain characters, often traversing the balance of good and evil. Well-written, well-acted villains can elevate games immeasurably. With this list, you can settle once and for just which bad guys are the best video game villains of all time!

When talking about iconic villains in video games, there are a few points to consider. Some antagonists are straight up funny despite the fact that they're brutally powerful and trying to kill you, but others are some of the coolest characters you'll find, undeniably charismatic and awesome despite their villainous nature that you can't help but be compelled. You don't feel bad about destroying them, but man, it's a fun ride. There are also plenty of anti-heroes on this list with compelling plot arcs and backstories.

Whether they're famous villains from classic games like SHODAN from System Shock 2, the multitude of villains and their sidekicks from the Final Fantasy series, the easily recognizable enemies throughout the Nintendo universe, or more recent heavies like the hilarious Handsome Jack from Borderlands 2, there are plenty of video game bad guys to explore. There are endless memorable villains from movies and TV, but we'd argue that video games offer some of the nastiest, baddest, and most infamous antagonists.

If you're a die-hard gamer, make your voice heard. Put on your most fearsome cape, twirl your mustache, and check out our list of ranked video game villains and vote up your favorite baddies. Vote for your favorite names to keep them at the top and downvote the worst villains you hated. If we missed any classic videogame antagonists, add them, and if you've faced off against all these villains, rerank the list!
